cause.description:
Nuclear power, as most things, has the potential to be extremally beneficial to all humanity. However, nuclear power, as most things, has been stripped of that potential goodness, and become a weapon capable of destroying millions of lifes. This cause has been set up in favor of total Nuclear Disarmament. So all those in favor are welcome and asked to join the cause.
EVERYONE is invited to join.
"Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule." - Budda
"Life is easy with eye's closed"
Any thoughts, feelings, or comments you may have to contribute, please feel free to do so on The Wall.
1. Stop using nuclear power for destruction
2. If everyone is dead, no one has won
3. Nuclear power should be used as an energy source
cause.mission: Stop using nuclear power for destruction
cause.name: Nuclear Disarmament
